data.eml:eml: Water mites of the genus Limnesia Koch, 1836 (Acari: Hydrachnidia, Limnesiidae) from China, with description of four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yi, Tianci, Jin, Daochao (2009): Water mites of the genus Limnesia Koch, 1836 (Acari: Hydrachnidia, Limnesiidae) from China, with description of four new species. Zootaxa 2234: 21-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190376
